name: TGM: Ball Roll
description:
This is the first game I have ever created, so it's definitely a bit rough around the edges and very short, but I'm happy with it and proud of myself for actually finishing it.

TGM stands for Testing Game Mechanics, so this game's intention was to test game mechanics that I want to use for future games. I am currently working on an idea for another game, and these are some of the mechanics that I want to implement into that game, so I thought a good first game would be just testing out and learning to create those mechanics. 

This game was created for a school project and I want to thank the teacher for having this project because without it, I don't think I would have ever actually finished this.

Thanks for playing my game! Make sure to stick around my page for when I release a new game!
